cells.data:
- set a timer on the written assesment 

- set a timer on the interview assesment

- 20 minutes for each problem 

-examples of live coding: https://launchschool.com/blog/live-session-beginning-ruby-part-3

``` ruby
def test(str)
  # p str.object_id
  str += '?'
  p str.object_id
  str.downcase!
end

test_str = "Written Assessment"
p test_str.object_id
test(test_str)

# puts test_str
```

``` ruby
def test
  puts "written assessment"
end

var = test

if var
  puts "written assessment"
else
  puts "interview"
end
```
